sources.title: The Green Archer (1940) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Victor Jory, Iris Meredith, James Craven
Writer: Edgar Wallace (based on a novel by)
Director:  James W. Horne 

In this edge-of-your-seat Cliffhanger from Columbia Pictures, a mysterious vigilante known as the Green Archer fights against a notorious criminal gang led by the villainous Abel Bellamy. 
üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:09     CHAPTER 1:  Prison Bars Beckon
32:57     CHAPTER 2:  The Face at the Window
54:11     CHAPTER 3:  The Devil's Dictograph
1:13:05  CHAPTER 4:  Vanishing Jewels
1:32:12  CHAPTER 5:  The Fatal Spark
1:51:09  CHAPTER 6:  The Necklace of Treachery
2:12:23  CHAPTER 7:  The Secret Passage
2:29:44  CHAPTER 8:  Garr Castle is Robbed
2:49:54  CHAPTER 9:  The Mirror of Treachery
3:08:00  CHAPTER 10: The Dagger That Failed
3:27:56  CHAPTER 11: The Flaming Arrow
3:47:02  CHAPTER 12: The Devil Dogs
4:06:38  CHAPTER 13: The Deceiving Microphone
4:24:30  CHAPTER 14: End of Hope
4:42:40  CHAPTER 15: The Green Archer Exposed
5:00:54  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Michael Bellamy (Kenne Duncan) inherits Garr Castle, but his brother Abel Bellamy (James Craven) has him unjustly imprisoned and moves into the castle himself. When Michael's wife Elaine (Dorothy Fay) fails to return after visiting Abel, her sister Valarie Howett (Iris Meredith), accompanied by her father Parker Howett (Forrest Taylor) and private detective Spike Holland (Victor Jory), rent an adjoining estate, determined to investigate the case. After learning that Valarie, her father, and Spike are in the vicinity, Abel is afraid they will discover his association with a gang of jewel thieves and desperately tries to have then all killed. Each attempt, however, is thwarted by the Green Archer, who mysteriously appears with his deadly bow-and-arrows whenever needed. Fighting fire with fire, Abel has one of his henchmen, Brad (Jack Ingram), impersonate the Green Archer..
metadata.Writer: Morgan Cox, John Cutting, Jesse Duffy
metadata.Actors: Victor Jory, Iris Meredith, James Craven
